name: Picnic Chicken Dinner
description: Great warm, or refrigerate and serve cold as classic picnic chicken the next day.

ingredients.name: Panko or fine, dry breadcrumbs or Cornflakes®
chicken pieces
ingredients.additionalInstruction: such as drumsticks and bone-in thighs, skinless

preparation: Spoon Lemon Dilly Dip into a bowl.
In a plastic bag, mix Panko with Lemon Dilly Dip Mix, Sea Salt, and Black Pepper.
Working with one piece of chicken at a time, coat with dip, then add to bag. Shake to coat evenly. Place on a Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Repeat with remaining pieces.
Roast until coating is golden and crispy and chicken is cooked through, approximately 40–50 minutes.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
